greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000010(n) - A285699(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[EulerPhi@ n - (n - If[n <= 2, n - 1, Module[{k = n - 2, e = Floor@ Log2@ n}, While[PowerMod[n, e, k] != 0, k--]; k]]), {n, 115}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 26 2017 *)
program: def a007947(n): return max(i for i in divisors(n) if core(i) == i)
def a285699(n): return 1 if n<2 else n - a079277(n)
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 116)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 26 2017
xref: Cf. A285710 (positions of zeros), A208815 (of negative terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 26 2017
